trends.title: NASA Delays Launch of Artemis II Lunar Mission Once Again
trends.summary: A failure in the helium flow of the SLS rocket has prompted NASA to delay the Artemis II moon mission. Rather than March 6, the launch is now targeted for April.

trends.summary: "The number one thing is to get out of your head this ideal that gets passed around in the self-help world: 'go get a mentor,' and everyone runs out and cold calls someone that's ridiculously too high and unachievable, and it doesn't work."

trends.id: quantonations doublesized second fund shows quantum still has believers
trends.title: Quantonation’s double-sized second fund shows quantum still has believers
trends.summary: Quantonation Ventures, a venture firm investing in quantum and physics-based startups, has closed its oversubscribed second fund at €220 million, or approximately $260 million. That’s more than twice the size of its inaugural fund, and comes in addition to other signals that the quantum winter isn’t coming yet.
